THIS IS NOT AN ISO! It is not a game disc of any sort!  The content and intallers that I've tried looked at so far are NOT English... but in fact French and other languages.  Deception in the title and vague description leads me to not trust this upload at all... This is simply a folder full of 45 independently zipped folders, each one containing a DIFFERENT variety of mystery game content.  Someone's collection of mixed and source unknown games, many needing different install/run activities in order to access the content or emulators to play properly.  How can this be called .ISO or imply that it's some type of plug and play game disc? Or being English content?  it's none!  I downloaded this in the thoughts it was an .ISO and could be used by my child.  I regret seeding...
